name: It's Raining (coolmintcrush)
description:
This is a chill game where you take grandma home safely.
Coding, pixel art, and music done by me. :)

*Unfinished game btw*
I know there is a lot of things wrong with the game, but I decided to stop working on it. I thought it was a good learning experience , and I want to make something like this again in the future.

twitch- where i stream myself making my games
https://www.twitch.tv/coolmintcrush
discord- where i talk about my games  and general game development stuff
https://discord.gg/7azGjSS
